name: The bone's line
description:
Hunger. A survey came out recently that stated that more than 110 million people in Brazil are “food unstable”. This means that more than half of people across the country do not know if they are going to eat the next day.

THE GAME: “The bone’s line” is a narrative waiting simulador inspired in real facts. Get your place in the queue to get food donatives. Talk to others and try to advance and get closer spots.

CONTROLS: MOUSE TO SELECT OPTIONS

CREDITS: All assets are original and made by me (Swami Abdalla-Santos) within 48 hours at LD49. Music are AI generated and customized by me.
